abilities.name: Upside-Down Evolution
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is Confused, you may search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon. (This counts as evolving this Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Confusion Wave
attacks.effect: Both Active Pokémon are now Confused.
